title: Unity builds not supported

labels.name: bug
labels.description: Bug reports and bugfix pull requests

labels.name: build
labels.description: Build file bugs and PRs (not compilation errors)

body:
Hello,
with github.com/go-gl/glfw, we're integrating the GLFW source to the wrapper repo to eliminate people installing it separately. With the release of 3.2 I see that there has been some updates.

```
 - Removed `_GLFW_USE_OPENGL`, `_GLFW_USE_GLESV1`, `_GLFW_USE_GLESV2`,
   `_GLFW_WGL`, `_GLFW_NSGL`, `_GLFW_GLX` and `_GLFW_EGL` configuration macros
```

As these macros no longer exist, how does one compile GLFW without getting below conflicts

```
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:35:0:
./glfw/src/egl_context.c:172:13: error: redefinition of 'makeContextCurrent'
 static void makeContextCurrent(_GLFWwindow* window)
             ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:34:0:
./glfw/src/wgl_context.c:234:13: note: previous definition of 'makeContextCurrent' was here
 static void makeContextCurrent(_GLFWwindow* window)
             ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:35:0:
./glfw/src/egl_context.c:204:13: error: redefinition of 'swapBuffers'
 static void swapBuffers(_GLFWwindow* window)
             ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:34:0:
./glfw/src/wgl_context.c:259:13: note: previous definition of 'swapBuffers' was here
 static void swapBuffers(_GLFWwindow* window)
             ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:35:0:
./glfw/src/egl_context.c:216:13: error: redefinition of 'swapInterval'
 static void swapInterval(int interval)
             ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:34:0:
./glfw/src/wgl_context.c:272:13: note: previous definition of 'swapInterval' was here
 static void swapInterval(int interval)
             ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:35:0:
./glfw/src/egl_context.c:221:12: error: redefinition of 'extensionSupported'
 static int extensionSupported(const char* extension)
            ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:34:0:
./glfw/src/wgl_context.c:287:12: note: previous definition of 'extensionSupported' was here
 static int extensionSupported(const char* extension)
            ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:35:0:
./glfw/src/egl_context.c:233:19: error: redefinition of 'getProcAddress'
 static GLFWglproc getProcAddress(const char* procname)
                   ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:34:0:
./glfw/src/wgl_context.c:316:19: note: previous definition of 'getProcAddress' was here
 static GLFWglproc getProcAddress(const char* procname)
                   ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:35:0:
./glfw/src/egl_context.c:248:13: error: redefinition of 'destroyContext'
 static void destroyContext(_GLFWwindow* window)
             ^
In file included from .\c_glfw_windows.go:34:0:
./glfw/src/wgl_context.c:327:13: note: previous definition of 'destroyContext' was here
 static void destroyContext(_GLFWwindow* window)
             ^
```

Thanks
